original_text: Then the Pharisees went out from the meeting place. They began to talk to each other about how they could kill Jesus.
korean_text: 바리새인들이 나가서 어떻게 하여 예수를 죽일까 의논하거늘

sentences.original_text: They began to talk to each other
about how they could kill Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 하면 예수를 죽일 수 있을지에 대해
